author: noel
msg: Fix for JAMES-271.  Allow get[All]ByName(String host) when the host is actually an IP literal with a trailing '.'.  java.net.InetAddress permits this, but org.xbill.DNS.Address does not.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: noel
msg: Fix JAMES-268.  Make sure that messages are not left in the lock set if there is an error retrieving them or the filter does not accept them for processing at this time.

author: noel
msg: Fix JAMES-269.  Change logging level for messages due to one thread processing cached list while another deletes a locked message it is finished with.

author: noel
msg: Fix JAMES-267.  Ensure a default value if there are no From: or Sender: headers.
